meanings.definition: Establishing or influencing a new trend or style.
meanings.sent1: Her trendsetting fashion choices inspired others to try new styles.
meanings.sent2: The trendsetting designs of the artist quickly gained popularity.
meanings.sent3: Everyone admired her trendsetting outfits at the party.
meanings.sent4: His trendsetting approach to marketing revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent5: The trendsetting hairstyle became an instant hit among teenagers.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that sets a trend or leads in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: She was known as a trendsetting in the world of technology.
meanings.sent2: The trendsetting in the music industry often face high expectations.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy became a trendsetting in the neighborhood for its cute tricks.
meanings.sent4: The trendsetting of the group was evident in their innovative projects.
meanings.sent5: As a trendsetting in fashion, she always knew the latest styles.
